attributes.comment:
Employment based legal immigrants, like me, have been waiting for years to get
out of this mess, paying more dollar year after year.

Remember, EB immigration is married to the job. That means, no promotion, no
substantial increase in salary. Imagine this for over six year or more. Trying to
balance the family budget and paying more and more fees for "immigration
benefits," is a taxing financially and mentally.

With Visa dates for adjustments of status set in stone age for people born in
India, the proposed fees will effectively be a second mortgage payment.

I STRONGLY OPPOSE this fee increase.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
